Posts.Content: How are you doing? The fruits and veggies take a lot of getting used to, but it is something we can all do in a gradual way. Did you get around to trying "probiotics" for the bowel? It, too, is a gradual way to get the bowel to respond. I hope you are feeling better.
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: Years ago before I had a formal diagnosis the child of an acquaintance claimed, quite audibly "You smell bad!"  The mother said nothing, not like "that is a rude thing to say" or "apologize for your comment".  Needless to say, I was chagrined and did not pursue anything further in the way of being around this person or her brood.  Within a few years I was to be diagnosed with cancer but never tied the comment to my situation. If only that mother and child had known what was occurring I might have been spared some of the health issues I was to face. And they might have taught them to take responsibility for what was obviously a 'gift'.   Was I angry? Not really. I just did not have enough information yet nor did that acquaintance ever acknowledge wha had transpired.
Posts.Title: Cancer smell
